storyInfo: The other party members plan to attract the mysterious High Priest with a delicious meal to cure Marcille's poisoning, but little did they expect Senshi's carefully chosen 'blue fatty bird' to actually be the very same High Priest they have been looking for the whole time.

attributes.content: My fin-drying rack! My bed!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Laios!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Since when was Marcille this quick?!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I think she's seeing us as the Red Dragon now!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Then what do we do?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Seeing how she only has Falin on her mind now, I should try...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Marcille! It's me, Laios! Falin's brother!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: No way! You're way too normal! Laios is the guy who'd intimidate a Basilisk with just a strange pose!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I mean, she's right.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Fine, if that's how it's gonna be!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: RAAAH—!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Laios... it really is you?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: That actually worked?!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Laios! The Red Dragon ate Falin, we need to defeat it so we can revive her!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Wait, why are you pointing at me?! What part of me looks like a dragon?!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Aagh!
attributes.name: Chilchuck & Senshi

attributes.content: What's her problem?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Ghah—Are her eyes rolling about as she stumbles everywhere?
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Is she lashing out and babbling nonsense?
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Yes, yes!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Foaming at the mouth?
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Yes, yes, yes!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Then she's poisoned! Lucky for you, but also unlucky, the only one who knows how to make the antidote is the High Priest!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: All we have are Kbibi grass that we use as a general cure-all for poisonings, illness, or upset stomachs. You can try using them, but I can't guarantee it'll work.
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Then... I'll hold Marcille down, while you guys go look for something to attract the High Priest!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: How? Where?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: A sumptuous feast ought to draw him in! She must be hallucinating, and if we don't hurry, she's going to blow my house up!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Chilchuck, go with the others! I'll handle it here!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Got it... we'll leave her to you!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Phew, that should be enough fruit and fish. Thanks for guiding me, friend. But could I trouble you with one more thing?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Fish? This is a fin.
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Oh... so that's what you call them here. Anyhow, I'd like you to return to the village first and boil me a pot of water.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Water?
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Aye, I just thought of something. A regular meal probably wouldn't be impressive enough, so I plan to make a huge stew!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: On one hand, consider it a thank you for everything you've done for us, and on the other, didn't you say the High Priest likes lively feasts?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Oh! You want to make a nice pot of stew? Great! I'll head back and get it started!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I have enough fruit and fish, but...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I still feel like something's missing...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Odd. Heard a strange noise and came over, but there's nothing here.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: And my 'Invincible Cool Thing' exploded too. My luck has been terrible today!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Fine, fine. I'll just go home and sleep it off!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: *Sigh* I wouldn't be out here all on my own if I hadn't promised Zumama I'd look after the research projects.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Plump and vibrant colors... A healthy bird. Let's check Bob's Gourmet Guide to see if its edible...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: 'Fowlbeasts are creatures covered with feathers that can fly. Edible, and delicious no matter how you cook them.'
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Hmm... this should make for the perfect main ingredient. Eye-catching too. I'm sure the High Priest will love it! This is it!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: (Why is there a Durin approaching me with a hungry look in his eyes?)
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: (Hm? Hold on. Is he really a Durin even?)
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: (...Ha, I see. How interesting.)
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: (Wait, it's been so long since I last played dead. How do you do it?)
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: SQUAAAAAWKKK!!!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: ...I don't think I hit it that hard?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Grk...guh...
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Well, as long as its dead.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Chilchuck! Have ya gathered enough fruit? Let's head back!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Laios, I know you're Laios, but why do I keep thinking you look more like the dragon?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Marcille, let's talk about Falin instead.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Yeah, she's my best friend! And, listen to me, she's so happy that you're her brother, Laios. She really likes you and always talks about you.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Everyone else considered her a terrible student, but I disagree. I learned so many things from her! I... I love her!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: But... but... I was too weak, so she... she got eaten by the dragon!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: ...It's not just your fault, Marcille.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: She's my sister, of course we're going to save her. I'll never give up.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: However, Laios cannot help but feel a little curious: how exactly does everyone look in the eyes of the poisoned Marcille?
Does Senshi look like a short and stout dragon? Is Chilchuck a tiny one?
Should he go look for some of the same fruit to find out for himself?
How's Marcille?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: She just fell asleep... They said it's how the body protects itself from the toxin, but it's still better to get the antidote sooner than later.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Good! I'll go get the stew started then, with this fatty bird I caught as the star of the broth!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I really hope this'll attract the High Priest...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Help me with the prep work and it'll be done sooner!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Check which way the wind is blowing... and build your fire downwind to avoid starting a forest fire.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Wash the fruits, mushrooms, and potatoes, then cut them into bite-sized chunks and put them aside.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Add some spices and Kbibi grass to the pot, and bring it to a boil so the meat will absorb the flavor better.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Then add the fruits and mushrooms for bringing out the umami taste, cook a few minutes more, then add the meat and potatoes.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Scale the fish, then slice open the belly and remove the organs. Wash the gills with running water or simply remove them with a knife.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Make diagonal cuts on the fish. Mix chili, pepper, salt, and lemon juice all together, then smear the mixture on the cuts...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Skewer them on clean branches and place them right by the campfire. Don't forget to rotate them now and then to ensure they're evenly cooked...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Now let's check back on our bird. When the broth starts to thicken, add some salt and have a little taste test!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Finally, simmer on low heat until that mouth-watering smell comes out...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Mmmm, and it's done! A pot of stew for the High Priest!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: How do you usually get his attention?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Sing! Dance! Cheer! Feast! Then he'll show up naturally!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Alright, then let's dig in, everyone!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Mm, the fruit and mushrooms enrich the flavor along with the herbs' unique aroma. A good stew.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Ah... it smells so good...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Sing! Dance! The High Priest won't come unless you get moving!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: O-Okay...!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: You too, Chilchuck and Senshi!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Uh... is the High Priest still not here yet?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: We'll have to use our ultimate method then. An earnest plea!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: High Priest! Delicious food awaits you, so please come!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: ...High Priest! Delicious food awaits you, so please come!
attributes.name: Chilchuck & Laios & Senshi

attributes.content: Uggh...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Gukhh!!
attributes.name: Fatty Bird & Vegetable Detox Stew

attributes.content: Slurp... Mm... mm...
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: *Gulp*
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: So warm...
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: I haven't had such a pleasant bath in a long time.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: But there are too many strange ingredients in here!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Half-cut lemons, sliced mushrooms, and cubed potatoes?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Chili pepper and Kbibi grass too, even!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Slurp... Mm... mm...
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Mm... Ugh! It tastes weird!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Is this a medicinal bath?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Oh... it feels like my butt is being broiled... Reminds me of the heat inside the cockpit before the mech takes off... This really is quite pleasant...
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: I'll just soak it in and all the exhaustion from the explosion will disappear!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Th-The bird came back to life?!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: It revived in the stew? Could it be...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...Oh, is it an 'undying monster'?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: High Priest! What are you doing inside the pot?!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: HIGH PRIEST?! This bird?? He was here the whole time?!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Ew... so that broth was his bath water?!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Ugh! I just drank some!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: (Oh... I wonder what the undead taste like...)
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Yes, I'm the High Priest!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: And during my bath, I figured out what you all want from me!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Seeing how your companion is poisoned, I will certainly not sit idly by!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: I don't remember mentioning that...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Ahem! To cure your companion...
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: The best method is to drink this medicinal bath water!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: I bet even a crazy feral wolf would come to its senses after having such a disgusting stew!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: D-Disgusting?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: If it's bad, I'm sure it's the main ingredient's fault.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Since the High Priest has spoken, please have your companion try the blessed stew!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Ugh... *Gulp*...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What a strange taste...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: ...Urgh... it's so noisy...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Great! The High Priest Stew really worked!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: High Priest... Stew?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Oh no!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Marcille struggles to open her eyes—
A monster that can speak! And still alive! The monster is currently sipping the soup in the pot, which shares the same aroma as the bowl of stew before her.
At the same time, Laios already has spoon in hand, and goes in for a quick scoop, sending it straight to his mouth.
Marcille licks her lips, finally comes back to her senses, and lets out a shriek—
M-MONSTER?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: AHHHHH—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I DON'T WANT IT—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I'M SICK OF EATING MONSTERS!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Heh, the stew's pretty good.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hahaha! You need your tastebuds checked, my boy!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: High Priest...?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Shh! I know what you want to know! I already have the gist of what's happened... Hmm, I see, but it's not the time yet.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: The time? For what?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Oh, nothing... You're looking for Rhodes Island, yes?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Yes, Rhodes Island can help you!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: You're moving in the right direction! Just carry on as you have!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Huh? He's gone? Again?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: He said we were heading in the right direction? Sounded to me like a whole bunch of nonsense...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: ...Because we're not even heading in any particular direction!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: So, Marcille... why did you eat the fruit?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...They looked like raspberries.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Raspberries?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: When I first met Falin, she offered me some. So when I found fruit here that looked exactly the same...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I thought they were raspberries too, and there was a little bird eating them, so I took two...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Well, you can tell her what happened later.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Yeah, and about all the trouble you caused while you had food poisoning!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Ugh, enough of that!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Let's continue our search for Rhodes Island!
attributes.name: Marcille
